config.gravelminer.title: GravelMiner
config.gravelminer.common.gravelBlocks.t: Blocks that will fall and break into items when hitting a non-solid block. Format: modid:name
config.gravelminer.common.triggerOnGrave: If set to true, the mod will trigger when mining gravel as well, instead of only when mining a non-gravel block below gravel.
config.gravelminer.common.isOptIn.toolti: If set to true, GravelMiner will only be active for users who install the mod on their clients (for use in servers).
config.gravelminer.common.rollFlintChanc: If set to true, gravel mined via GravelMiner will have a chance of dropping as flint (server-side only).
config.gravelminer.client.isEnabled.tool: Whether GravelMiner is currently enabled for this client (toggled via keybind)
config.gravelminer.client.activation.too: Defines when GravelMiner should activate. Either ALWAYS, WHEN_SNEAKING or WHEN_NOT_SNEAKING
